attributes.action: increase GP surgery hours to include weekends and evenings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Practices should be open at least one evening a week, and one weekend per month for working people who are required to make regular visits to see their GP or a nurse.

Individuals with ongoing health conditions who are unable to attend during regular hours due to work commitments are frequently inconvenienced and their health put at risk.
